constraints.name: unique_names
constraints.description: 每个名字的首字母组合成的NAME必须是唯一的，如果两个或多个名字生成相同的NAME，则这些NAME不再被视为独特。
constraints.formal: For all i, j (i != j), if NAME(i) == NAME(j), then NAME(i) is not unique.

constraints.name: name_format
constraints.description: 每个名字由若干个单词组成，每个单词只包含小写字母。每个名字的首字母组合成一个NAME。
constraints.formal: Each name is a sequence of words, where each word consists only of lowercase letters. The NAME is the concatenation of the first letters of each word in the name.
